title: Patch 5.1 Rolled Out, Already Issues (LeaverBuster)
body:
So, how absolutely typical of Riot.  Let's focus on new champions and more money, and not give two sh*ts about game breaking issues.  After this last patch, I was pinged with leaverbuster for absolutely no reason whatsoever. I haven't left a game in months. Me and 4 friends have waited 20 minutes now to get into a game because of this, and it's absurd.  I've done a google search, and it's happening to other people too.

tl;dr Riot needs to get their sh*t together. {{summoner:14}} {{summoner:14}} {{summoner:14}}

replies.body: I am currently suffering the same penalty for no reason. Delayed doesn't account for the penalty. Just out of nowhere. D:

>
> I am currently suffering the same penalty for no reason. Delayed doesn't account for the penalty. Just out of nowhere. D:

You left a significant number of games in the middle of December. The punishment for that wasn't applied until today.

> [{quoted}](name=RiotTantram,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=Y1GAHeGF,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2015-01-16T02:04:55.921+0000)

> You left a significant number of games in the middle of December. The punishment for that wasn't applied until today.

Is it still just five games? I thought they forgave those matches that were caused by the firewall bug, and I served my time in december when it had me on 20 minute timers for 7 matches straight. Please advise.

> [{quoted}](name=Hucho,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=Y1GAHeGF,comment-id=000200000000,timestamp=2015-01-16T02:43:35.827+0000)
>
> Is it still just five games? I thought they forgave those matches that were caused by the firewall bug, and I served my time in december when it had me on 20 minute timers for 7 matches straight. Please advise.

I at least want to know how long my punishment is and which matches it is for, because I was leaver-bustered in december. what matches did I leave, and was that due to the firewall bug which was unavoidable, and was I already serving penalty time during that time frame?

"and not give two sh*ts about game breaking issues."

Because they never temporarily disable Champions due to game breaking bugs on day one of new patches.
